title: Motion Graphic Designer
description:
**Key Responsibilities Include:**

* Video creation from concept to storyboarding to animation
* Conceptualize, visualize and storyboard scripts, animations and visual images for custom explainer videos
* Produce a variety of animated/motion graphics
* Modify and/or rework existing motion graphic assets
* Collaboration with internal cross-function teams (project managers, writers and lead designers)

**The right person for this role will have the following qualifications:**

* At least two years of professional 2D motion graphics/animation experience
* Excellent command of the Adobe package with an emphasis on Adobe Illustrator (to create storyboards) and After Effects (for animation)
* Strong knowledge of basic animation principles
* Ability to follow style guidelines, concept art and direction provided by other team members
* Ability to provide creative solutions to solve challenges
* Excellent written and spoken English language skills
* Strong organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to prioritize
* Positive, ‘can do’ attitude
* Adaptable and willing to take on suggestions and input
* Ability to take initiative and make things happen independently and without supervision
* Self-motivated to do great work and meet tight deadlines
* Proactive communication skills
* Maturity to handle extremely confidential information
* Open-minded, innovative, creative and eager to learn
* Experience in creating infographics is a desired skill

description:
**Job Description:**

Job Title: Customer Service Associate (CSA)

Location: New Delhi

Department: Customer Support

Job Type: Full-Time

Languages: English and Punjabi

Role: Permanent

**Job Summary**

We are seeking a highly motivated and dynamic Customer Service Associate (CSA) to join our team. The ideal candidate will be a graduate with excellent communication skills in both English and Punjabi. As a CSA, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service to our clients, ensuring their inquiries are resolved promptly and efficiently.

Key Responsibilities:

**Customer Interaction:**

- Handle inbound and outbound customer calls in a professional and courteous manner.

- Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.

- Resolve customer complaints and issues promptly, escalating to higher levels when necessary.

**Communication:**

- Provide clear and concise information to customers about products, services, and policies.

- Communicate effectively in both English and Punjabi to cater to a diverse customer base.

**Problem-Solving:**

- Identify and resolve customer issues efficiently and effectively.

- Provide accurate information and solutions by following company policies and procedures.

**Documentation:**

- Maintain detailed and accurate records of customer interactions and transactions.

- Update customer information in the database accurately and promptly.

**Team Collaboration:**

- Work closely with team members and other departments to ensure a seamless customer experience.

- Participate in team meetings

title: Front Office Team Leader
description:
A **Front Office Team Leader** is a key member of the hospitality industry. The role requires excellent communication and organizational skills, as well as the ability to work well under pressure. The **Front Office Team Leader** is responsible for overseeing the work of front desk staff, ensuring that they provide exceptional customer service to guests. Responsible for managing room inventory and coordinating with other departments, such as housekeeping and maintenance, to ensure that guest rooms are clean and well-maintained. Must also be able to handle financial transactions, such as processing payments and managing cash drawers.

**Front Office Team Leader Duties & Responsibilities:**

* Ensure Outstanding customer care at all times.
* Maintains a friendly, cheerful, and courteous demeanour at all times.
* Courteously and accurately answers inquiries from potential guests and accepts hotel reservations.
* Respond to telephone and in-person inquiries regarding reservations, hotel information, and guest concerns.
* Supervise daily shift process ensuring all team members adhere to standard operating procedures.
* Train, direct the work of, resolve issues/problems, and coach and counsel the front desk team members to ensure a quality operation.
* Resolve customer issues, complaints, and problems in a quick, efficient manner to maintain a high level of customer satisfaction and quality service.
* Allocate rooms to expected arrivals after checking the guest’s preferences and special requests.
* Build strong relationships and liaise with all other departments especially housekeeping, reservations, etc.
* Cross Check all billing instructions are correctly updated.
* Controls cash transactions at the front desk and maintains complete responsibility for personal bank as specified by hotel bank agreement policy.
* Ensures safety by following guest check-in and security procedures and reporting suspicious activity to security, manager, or MOD.

**EDUCATION:**

* A degree or Diploma in Hospitality Management is an asset or a graduate’s bachelor’s degree and/or diploma in hotel or other related field. Computer Knowledge and experience in MS Office programs.

**EXPERIENCE:**

Minimum 2 to 3 years work experience as Front Office Associate or Front Office Team Leader.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

title: BAMS Doctor
description:
Urgent Hiring (Telle Consultation)

Night shift (US & UK Shift) with good communication skills.

Job Description (JD) for BAMS (Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery) Doctor:

Position: BAMS Doctor

**Job Summary:** As a BAMS Doctor, you will be responsible for providing patient care using Ayurvedic principles and treatments. Your role involves diagnosing illnesses, creating treatment plans, and offering holistic healthcare to patients. Collaboration with other healthcare professionals and maintaining accurate medical records is essential.

**Key Responsibilities:**

1. **Patient Consultation:**

· Conduct thorough consultations to understand patients' medical history, symptoms, and lifestyle.

· Diagnose health conditions using Ayurvedic principles and techniques.

2. **Treatment Planning:**

· Develop personalized treatment plans based on Ayurvedic principles.

· Prescribe herbal medicines, dietary recommendations, and lifestyle modifications.

· Administer Panchakarma therapies when necessary.

3. **Holistic Healthcare:**

· Promote overall well-being through holistic healthcare practices.

· Educate patients about Ayurvedic principles and preventive measures.

4. **Collaboration:**

· Collaborate with allopathic doctors and other healthcare professionals when necessary.

· Maintain effective communication with patients and their families.

5. **Record Keeping:**

· Maintain accurate and up-to-date medical records for all patients.

· Document treatment plans, progress, and any changes in the patient's condition.

6. **Health Promotion:**

· Conduct health awareness programs and workshops to promote Ayurvedic healthcare in the community.

· Stay updated on advancements in Ayurvedic medicine and healthcare practices.

7. **Compliance:**

· Adhere to all legal and ethical standards in the practice of Ayurvedic medicine.

· Ensure compliance with local and national healthcare regulations.

8. **Emergency Response:**

· Provide immediate care in emergency situations and refer patients to appropriate specialists when needed.

**Qualifications:**

· Bachelor's degree in Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (BAMS).

· Valid state license to practice as an Ayurvedic doctor.

· Additional certifications or training in specific Ayurvedic specialties is a plus.

**Skills and Abilities:**

· Strong knowledge of Ayurvedic principles and treatments.

· Excellent diagnostic and decision-making skills.

· Effective communication

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: Up to ₹50,000.00 per month

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* Physician: 1 year (Preferred)
* total work: 1 year (Preferred)

title: Restaurant/Food Outlet Videographer
description:
**Job Summary:**

Rs. 35000 per month! Are you young? Are you hungry? We are seeking a creative and skilled **Videographer** to join our team and help restaurant clients build their brand presence through engaging social media video content. The ideal candidate will travel to client locations to capture high-quality footage for social media platforms, including Instagram Reels, TikTok videos, and YouTube shorts, aimed at promoting restaurant offerings, ambiance, and brand identity.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Travel to restaurant clients' locations to capture video content for social media and marketing campaigns.
* Collaborate with restaurant owners and marketing teams to understand branding goals and develop creative concepts.
* Film short-form videos, including behind-the-scenes content, customer experiences, food preparation, and restaurant ambiance.
* Edit and optimize videos for social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube), ensuring each piece aligns with platform specifications and trends.
* Add dynamic elements such as graphics, captions, music, and animations to enhance content engagement.
* Maintain consistent communication with clients, incorporating their feedback and suggestions to improve video content.
* Stay up-to-date with current social media trends, video editing techniques, and branding strategies to ensure content remains fresh and relevant.
* Organize and maintain video files and deliver final products in a timely manner.

**Qualifications:**

* Proven experience as a videographer, with a portfolio showcasing short-form content (reels, TikToks, etc.), ideally in the food, hospitality, or lifestyle industries.
* Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
* Strong understanding of social media platforms, including their content specifications and trends.
* Excellent storytelling skills with the ability to convey brand messages through visuals.
* Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with clients.
* Flexibility to travel to different locations and work in various environments.
* A keen eye for detail, creativity, and a passion for content creation.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Experience in photography, especially food photography, is a plus.
* Knowledge of branding and digital marketing strategies.

title: Customer Service Executive
company: Hammer Head Global Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
description:
**Job Summary**

Our growing business is looking for a skilled problem solver to join our team as Virtual Field Supervisor. We need an enthusiastic individual who can listen to field employees’ issues and then offer unique and innovative solutions to each other problems. The successful candidate for this role will have a strong command of the company’s customer service policies, and be well-trained in industry knowledge that can be critical for offering quick and accurate assistance to employees.

**Responsibilities and Duties**

1. Call filed employees/clients (based in the US) to perform security checks.

2. Answers incoming calls regarding issues, service questions, and general client concerns.

3. Responsible for maintaining a high level of professionalism with clients and working to establish a positive rapport with every caller.

4. Update information in the service database/report during and after each call.

5. Work with the management team to stay updated on industry knowledge and be informed of any changes in company policies.

6. Impact the company’s bottom line by problem-solving and turning frustrated clients into repeat customers.

7. Establish and manage communication with corporate, Clients, staff, and management.

8. Ensure effective telephone and email communications both internally to maintain a professional image.

9. Organize and prioritize office tasks to fulfill all administrative requirements.

10. Coordinate meetings with the US team.

11. Participate as needed in special department projects.

**Qualifications and skills**

1. Graduation or Equivalent

2. Prior customer service experience is a plus.

3. Time management

4. Collaboration skills

5. Problem-Solving/ Analysis

6. Personal effectiveness/credibility

7. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

title: Site Supervisor
description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Site Supervisor to join our team. The Site Supervisor will play a crucial role in overseeing the construction process, ensuring that projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. This role requires strong leadership abilities, excellent communication skills, and a keen attention to detail.

**Responsibilities:**

- Manage on-site construction activities to ensure adherence to design specifications, timelines, and budget constraints.

- Collaborate with architects, interior designers, and contractors to resolve any design or construction issues that may arise during the project.

- Conduct regular site inspections to monitor progress, quality of workmanship, and compliance with safety regulations.

- Review and interpret architectural drawings, plans, and specifications to guide construction activities.

- Coordinate with suppliers, subcontractors, and vendors to procure materials and equipment as needed.

- Document project progress, including daily reports, photographs, and as-built drawings.

- Communicate effectively with clients to address concerns, provide updates, and obtain approvals as required.

**Requirements:**

- Bachelor’s degree in Architecture, Interior Design, or related field.

- Proven experience of 2-5 years in site supervision or construction management within the architectural or interior design industry.

- Strong knowledge of construction techniques, building codes, and regulations.

- Proficiency in reading and interpreting architectural drawings and blueprints.

- Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills.

- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

- Proficiency in relevant software and tools.

- Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on quality and precision.

- Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.

- Ability to work independently and make decisions confidently.

- Proficiency in relevant software and tools for project management and documentation.

**Benefits:**

- Competitive salary commensurate with experience.

- Opportunities for career growth and professional development.

- Collaborative and supportive work environment with a diverse team of professionals.

- Chance to contribute to exciting and innovative architectural projects that make a difference in communities.

title: Sr. Software Engineer
description:
We are looking for a talented Senior Software Engineer who is passionate about designing and building a highly available, reliable, and secure platform. You will have an opportunity to take highly leading-edge concepts and make them accessible as an everyday tool for healthcare, run them on massive amounts of data, and visualize the results in intuitive ways. You should have a proven track record of having designed and delivered enterprise-grade solutions and/or services software. You must be self-driven, proactive, results-oriented, and can work with minimal ongoing direction. You must own the entire software development and service delivery life cycle - design, development, validation, and live site responsibility.

**Requirements:** 

* BE or MS degree in Computer science or equivalent.
* Deep knowledge of building high-performance, highly available, reliable, distributed systems software with a Services Oriented Architecture (SOA).
* Good understanding of cloud development principles and design patterns, clean separation of services, Map-Reduce, etc.
* Experience designing systems and processes for running end user-facing services at scale, to drive cost, and operational efficiency.
* A strong background in Data Structures, Algorithms, Design patterns, analysis of algorithm complexity, and efficient implementation of complex algorithms.
* Expertise in Python or equivalent programming languages and multi-threaded programming, distributed programming.
* Experience with software development tools such as source control systems, automated build systems, compilers, software validation systems, test harnesses, continuous integration, and deployment.
* Must have strong debugging skills.
* Familiar with Software and Secure Development Life Cycle. Proficiency in unit-testing and other validation techniques.
* Deliver services with a Continuous Integration, Validation, and Deployment methodology.
* Ability to drive and manage technical and architectural dependencies.
* Development experience with cloud platforms such as Azure Web Services, Hadoop, etc. is a definite plus.
* Use of open-source products.
* Experience in leading and mentoring a team of developers.
* Qualifications: Education - BE or MCA.

**Experience:** 

* 4+ years of experience as a software developer working on industrial strength software and a proven track record of having shipped commercially successful software products.
* Of which 3+ years of Python programming experience and 2+ years of Django experience.
* Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate in a multi-disciplinary team consisting of Software Engineers, and Software Development Managers.

**Computer Skills:** 

* Full Stack Developer with Python and Django experience is a must.
* Expertise in Python/Django, and multi-threaded programming. Distributed Programming skills.
* Fluent in HTML 5 JavaScript, Jquery, Cascading Style Sheets, AJAX, SQL Server/Postgres, REACT JS, and Node JS.
* Knowledge of Design Patterns.
* Frameworks Development, Health Care Domain/Technologies, Performance tuning skills, SQL Design skills.
